at0000.description: A type of medical ultrasonography used to visualize abtominal anatomical structures.

at0004.description: Is a calculus formed within the galbladder as a concretion of bile components.

at0005.description: It refers to distension and dilatation of the renal pelvis and calyces, usually caused by obstruction og the free flow of urine from the kidney.

at0008.description: Is the abnormal enlargement of organs.

at0011.description: Is an inability to completely empty the bladder.

at0012.description: Is any localized enlargement or swelling in the human abdomen.

at0000.description: Scansione ecografica dell'addome, usata per visualizzare le strutture anatomiche presenti.

at0004.description: Calcoli formati all'interno della cistifellea in seguito a concrezion biliari.

at0005.description: Si riferisce alla distensione e dilatazione dei bacinetti renali e dei calici, generalmente causata da un'ostruzione del flusso urinario a valle.
